      Draws map onto screen, from bottom to top: each tile in matrix, each wave, wizard house (seperate from matrix as to be drawn above monsters and other tiles), range circles around tower cursor is over under ui all towers' fireballs'

      • addWaveTimes

        public double addWaveTimes()
        Finds what wave time needs to be put onto the screen Does so by adding current wave time with next wave prewave pause directly from config
        Returns:
        wave time to be put onto screen

      • updateAllPaths

        public void updateAllPaths()
        Iterates through each tile in matrix and assigns properties to each path

      • createRoute

        public java.util.ArrayList<WizardTD.Direction> createRoute(Path spawn)
        create route from terminal paths (spawns) to wizard via optimal paths.
        Parameters:
        spawn - spawn to create route from
        Returns:
        list of optimal path directions to get to wizard

      • createRoutes

        public void createRoutes()
        create routes for each spawn by calling createRoute on each terminal path

      • nextWave

        public void nextWave()
        Creates next wave and adds it to wave list. If its the last wave, set last wave to true. Otherwise, set wave time to be the next wave time.

      • place

        public boolean place(int x,
                     int y,
                     boolean initialRangeLevel,
                     boolean initialFiringSpeedLevel,
                     boolean initialDamageLevel)
        Places tower on map (in matrix) if player can afford it, and grass tile. Deducts mana and provides initial upgrades accordingly.
        Parameters:
        x - mouse x coordinate
        y - mouse y coordinate
        initialRangeLevel - whether tower was placed in range mode
        initialFiringSpeedLevel - whether tower was placed in firing speed mode
        initialDamageLevel - whether tower was placed in damage mode
        Returns:
        whether tower was placed

      • determineUpgrades

        public boolean[] determineUpgrades(int noOfUpgrades,
                                   boolean initialRangeLevel,
                                   boolean initialFiringSpeedLevel,
                                   boolean initialDamageLevel)
        Applies appropriate upgrade order. This is based on requested upgrades and number upgrades player can afford.
        Parameters:
        noOfUpgrades - number of upgrades player can afford
        initialRangeLevel - whether player wants to upgrade range
        initialFiringSpeedLevel - whether player wants to upgrade firing speed
        initialDamageLevel - whether player wants to upgrade damage
        Returns:
        array of booleans representing which upgrades to apply

      • upgrade

        public void upgrade(int x,
                    int y,
                    boolean range,
                    boolean speed,
                    boolean dmg)
        This method does multiple things: Which tower is to be upgraded What upgrades are to be applied based on what can be afforded How much mana to deduct, and doing so
        Parameters:
        x - mouse x coordinate
        y - mouse y coordinate
        range - whether in range mode
        speed - whether in speed mode
        dmg - whether in damage mode

      • drawRangeCircle

        public void drawRangeCircle(App app)
        Draws range circle around tower cursor is over under ui, over tiles
        Parameters:
        app - needs app to draw

        y - mouse y coordinate
        Returns:
        corresponding tile object

      • tick

        public void tick()
        Applies map logic each frame to: each wave (+ wave time), mana, towers, screen poison.

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet app)
        Draws map onto screen, from bottom to top: each tile in matrix, each wave, wizard house (seperate from matrix as to be drawn above monsters and other tiles), range circles around tower cursor is over under ui all towers' fireballs'
        Parameters:
        app - needs app to draw
